title: firecracker jinx
body:
when is it coming out my friend said its coming out on Chinese new years but cloud you please confirm this so i can save my own Chinese money for it  
thank you riot BTW just saying its most likely will come out that day would also just be great news be its self

replies.body: It so cartoony though, think of Mulan!
Based off previous released of the skin series it will most likely be released around the 3rd of February give or take a week. I hope this helps you out!
